options.name: label
options.default: 'Drag and drop files or click to select'

options.name: leave
options.default: 'You have uploads pending, are you sure you want to leave this page?'

options.name: maxQueue
options.description: Number of files to simultaneously upload

options.name: postData
options.description: Extra data to post with upload

name: Upload
description: A jQuery plugin for simple drag and drop uploads.
